body_html: Thanks for the contribution! I'm a bit confused though -- you've made the change to the crosstool when compiling with GPUs. Did you intend to want it to work without --config=cuda too?
body_text: Thanks for the contribution!  I'm a bit confused though -- you've made the change to the crosstool when compiling with GPUs.  Did you intend to want it to work without --config=cuda too?
body: Thanks for the contribution!  I'm a bit confused though -- you've made the change to the crosstool when compiling with GPUs.  Did you intend to want it to work without --config=cuda too?
